description: Women chant "we are sick of this" as they stage unusual protests inside churches across Poland.
title: Poland abortion ruling: Protesters disrupt church services
title_page: Poland abortion ruling: Protesters disrupt church services - BBC News
maintext: "I'm here today because it annoys me that in a secular country the church decides for me what rights I have, what I can do and what I'm not allowed to do," one 26-year-old protester, Julia Miotk, told Reuters news agency.
